posts.post_content:
It probably doesn't affect creatures with double strike. The ruling specific says a creature loses First Strike, and since it's a separate ability from Double Strike, Double Strike wouldn't be affected.  
  
That's how I see it, anyhow.

Posted By: Ligerman30 (2/17/2013 10:11:31 PM)
Rating:

@SengirPatriarch: It doesn't interact with double strike at all. It only removes first strike, which they don't have.

Against a double strike creature, both this card and the double-striker will do damage at the same time, in the first strike step; and then (if it's still alive) the double striker will do a second iteration of damage in the 'normal' step.

Anyway, this card is mostly terrible. First Strike is a somewhat rare and situational ability in the first place; it's not worth paying so much extra to interact with it.
